description: In Hawai'i, you get pretty used to going barefoot. Simulating that same weightless feeling, the versatile Nohea Mesh, with its breathable mesh upper, and Olukai's patented Drop-In Heel, lets the air out while keeping the comfort in.
name: Olukai Nohea Mesh - Mens

specs.value: Lightweight, breathable mesh and minimally lined with soft, breathable microfiber lining
Dual-density anatomical PU footbed with a gel insert and a soft microfiber footbed cover. Removable and washable
All-weather, non-marking rubber and gum rubber outsole pods for flexibility and traction
